title: bettor-help
author: bettor-help
content: Hello, I want to buy austria and croatia sim cards in bulk.Basically if you are in either one of the countries, just buy them in a shop and send them to me. I can pay 60 euro (+sim and parcel cost) for one package.Escrow only.TG: G44433

comments.author: anubizz
comments.body: HiI visit Austria quite often and can get SIM cards for you. But you will have to register them online, after you activate them. If you want me to to get it for you, just send a PM.

comments.author: Fademigo
comments.body: Quote from: bettor-help on May 20, 2023, 12:30:28 PMHello, I want to buy austria and croatia sim cards in bulk.Basically if you are in either one of the countries, just buy them in a shop and send them to me. I can pay 60 euro (+sim and parcel cost) for one package.Escrow only.TG: G44433Send me message

comments.body: I would be also interested. Prefer anonymous cards.

comments.body: Quote from: Tolino on October 21, 2023, 05:01:18 PMI would be also interested. Prefer anonymous cards. contact me

comments.author: anubizz
comments.body: Quote from: Tolino on October 21, 2023, 05:01:18 PMI would be also interested. Prefer anonymous cards.Anonymous SIM cards are not avaliable in Austria any more. You have to register them with an ID now.For cards without the need of an ID you would have to choose another country. Like Czech Republic, for example.

comments.body: Interested in anonymous cards activated from Hungary?
